title: Mexican-style bean and chorizo salad
description: A quick and tasty Mexican-style bean salad recipe made with baby plum tomatoes, chorizo and lime.
ingredients: 100g baby plum or Pomodorino tomatoes, halved lengthways
110g piece cooked chorizo, skinned, halved and thickly sliced
A good handful chopped fresh coriander.

method.Step 1: Drain the can of beans and rinse them. Put the beans into a large bowl with the tomatoes, chorizo and coriander. Add the lime juice and olive oil, and season. Toss together and set aside for 10 min, until juicy.

method.Step 2: Divide between two plates and serve with chunks of crusty bread to mop up the juices, if you like.
